text: Charles Toubé (22 January 1958 – 4 August 2016) was a Cameroonian football player. He plays for Tonnerre Yaoundé and Cameroon national football team. He was born in Yaoundé. Toubé died at a hospital in Douala on 4 August 2016 at the age of 58.Cameroun - Nécrologie: L’ancien Lion indomptable Charles Toube est mort Former Indomitable Lions defender, Toube Charles dies in a Douala hospital == References == Category:1958 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:People from Yaoundé
title: Charles Toubé
